rules_text:
Trample
[i]Goddess of Love[/i] – Whenever a creature you control blocks, put a shield counter on it and tap it. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
[i]Divine Accord[/i] – {2}{G}{W}{U}, exile Mila, Earth Mother: Each players life total becomes 40. Tap each creature on the battlefield and put two stun counters on each of them. Activate only if you control a creature named Duma.
